name: Tractor Pull Legends
description:
Build a farm full of rides and take your game to the big leagues.

Compete in tractor events including sled pulling, hill climbing, and tug of war tournaments.

Put together a winning season for points, bucks and online glory as you take on the field.

A big as you are, don't forget about your farm. Make sure to get back to the home to the farm often and at least load up some hay.
